nodes.text: Rich Handley is an author who has written a number of Star Wars articles, as well as a few comics and stories. Rich is also the author of three non–Star Wars books, Timeline of the Planet of the Apes: The Definitive Chronology, Lexicon of the Planet of the Apes: The Comprehensive Encyclopedia and A Matter of Time: The Back to the Future Lexicon, published by Hasslein Books.
